page.title: Exxon Mobil Profit Up 56 Percent
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Exxon Mobil Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=XOM.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">XOM.N</A>, the world's largest publicly traded oil company, on Thursday said quarterly profit surged 56 percent, driven by soaring oil prices and strong results from refining operations.
